changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ACTORS( id serial PRIMARY KEY, name varchar(30) NOT NULL, date_of_birth timestamp WITH time ZONE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE, country_id integer NOT NULL, height integer, date_of_creation timestamp WITH time ZONE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE, date_of_change timestamp WITH time ZONE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE, CONSTRAINT ct_actor UNIQUE(name), CONSTRAINT fk_country FOREIGN KEY (country_id) REFERENCES COUNTRIES(id) );
